default.bot_description: A simple bot that reminds you to drink water
default.command_not_found: Command not found. Type `@Hydr8 help` to see all commands.
default.no_permission_message: You don't have permission to give this bot instructions
default.cmd_activate_desc_brief: Activate the reminder in this channel
default.cmd_activate_desc_full: Activate a reminder in this channel to drink water every once in a while
default.cmd_activate_msg: I'll send reminders to drink water in this channel from now on!
default.amd_active_msg_already: I'm already sending reminders to drink water in this channel
default.cmd_stop_desc_brief: Stop reminding me to drink water in this channel
default.cmd_stop_desc_full: Stop reminding me to drink water in this channel
default.cmd_stop_msg: I'll stop sending reminders to drink water in this channel.
default.cmd_stop_msg_not-active: I'm already not sending reminders to drink water in this channel

nl.bot_description: Een simpele bot die je herinnert om water te drinken
nl.reminder_message: @here, vergeet niet om water te drinken!
nl.command_not_found: Commando niet gevonden. Type `@Hydr8 help` om alle commando's te zien.
nl.no_permission_message: Je hebt geen toestemming om deze bot instructies te geven
nl.cmd_activate_desc_brief: Activeer de herinnering in dit kanaal
nl.cmd_activate_desc_full: Activeer een herinnering in dit kanaal om water te drinken zo nu en dan
nl.cmd_activate_msg: Ik zal herinneringen sturen om water te drinken in dit kanaal vanaf nu!
nl.amd_active_msg_already: Ik stuur al herinneringen om water te drinken in dit kanaal
nl.cmd_stop_desc_brief: Stop met herinneringen om water te drinken in dit kanaal
nl.cmd_stop_desc_full: Stop met herinneringen om water te drinken in dit kanaal
nl.cmd_stop_msg: Ik zal geen herinneringen meer sturen om water te drinken in dit kanaal.
nl.cmd_stop_msg_not-active: Ik stuur al geen herinneringen om water te drinken in dit kanaal
